about_the_game:
Welcome to Restaurant Tycoon: My Cooking Empire, where the kitchen is your kingdom, the clock is your toughest competitor, and your home is a reflection of your culinary success. Whether you’re grilling burgers, rolling sushi, or flipping pancakes, each meal is a test of your speed, strategy, and creativity.

With 9 different cuisines to master and over 1000 levels to conquer, every day presents a fresh challenge. You’ll craft 500+ unique dishes that push your skills to the limit, and with countless upgrades available, you can truly make every kitchen your own.  But it’s not just about the kitchens—you’ll also have your own home, where you can upgrade furniture and unlock trophies as you complete major game stages. Your home becomes a showcase of your achievements, growing and evolving as you progress through the game. 

The real challenge? Handling the pressure. Orders will pile up, customers will get impatient, and every decision counts. It’s frantic, fun, and incredibly satisfying when everything falls into place.|

This game is easy to pick up but hard to master, delivering over a hundred hours of fast-paced, time-management bliss. Whether you're managing your kitchens or customizing your home, every decision makes your empire stronger.

Are you ready to prove that you have what it takes to become the ultimate Restaurant Tycoon?

Key Features:

  • 9 Cuisines to Master: From street food to sushi, each kitchen offers a fresh cooking style to master.

  • 500+ Dishes: Serve up a menu packed with unique, challenging dishes from all over the world.

  • 1000+ Levels: Non-stop action as you manage increasingly complex kitchens and time-management challenges.A

  • Custom Kitchens & Home: Upgrade ingredients, improve restaurant efficiency, and furnish your home with trophies and furniture upgrades as you advance.

  • Fast-Paced Fun: Easy to dive into, but mastering the chaos will take time and skill.

name: Restaurant Tycoon: My Cooking Empire

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista or Later
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo or faster
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 compliant video card
  • Storage: 3482 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Standard Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad highly recommended

short_description: Love cooking games? Manage 9 distinct kitchens, craft over 500 dishes, and rise to culinary stardom across 1000+ fast-paced levels in Restaurant Tycoon: My Cooking Empire. Customize your home, unlock trophies, and bring the heat!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Traditional Chinese
